resources.string:
Players: 
- Players are divided into Hunters and Runners. 
- Hunters try to catch Runners before the time runs out. 
- Runners try to avoid being caught and survive until the timer ends. 

Location: 
- The game is played in the real world within a designated play area. 
- Each person is assigned one random passive and one random active ability based on their role. 

Passive Ability 
Passive abilities is always active without the player needing to activate it. 

Active Ability 
Active abilities must be activated manually by the player. After activation, the ability will go on cooldown before it can be used again.
Hunters can move freely within the designated play area. \nTagging a Runner eliminates that Runner from the current game.
Runners must stay within the designated play area. \nRunners cannot attack or obstruct the Hunters. \nEliminated Runners become spectators and cannot assist the Hunters.

Passive Abilities 
Scan: Increase detection radius. 
Tracker: Briefly reveals a random Runner every few seconds. 
Tough: Reduce duration of negative effects. 

Active Abilities 
Compass: Reveals the direction to the nearest Runner for a few seconds. 
Trap: Set a trap on the map. Reveal Runners who enters the trapped area. 
Invisibility: Runners cannot see the Hunter location while ability is active. 
Lock On: Lock onto first spotted Runner. Runner remains revealed for a few extra seconds after leaving the detection radius. 
Ring: Ring the phones of all Runners for a few seconds.

Passive Abilities 
Ping: Briefly reveal all Hunter locations every few seconds. 
Aware: Increase Hunter detection radius. 
Warning: Show an indicator if the Hunter is within a certain distance. 
Stationary: Marker disappears if standing still for an extended period. 
Hidden: Reduce reveal radius. 

Active Abilities 
Invisibility: Hunters cannot see Runner location for a short duration. 
Flash Bang: Temporarily turn Hunterâ€™s map white. 
Decoy: Send a fake decoy on the map. 
Smoke Screen: Temporarily obscures Runner locations on the Hunter map in a radius around the Runner. 
Trap: Set a trap on the map. Notify all Runners when Hunters trigger the trap.

Achievements: 
First Match: Complete your first match. 
First Win: Earn your first win. 
Veteran: Play 50 matches. 
Win Streak: Win 10 games in a row. 
Clutch: Win a match in the final ten seconds. 
Hunter: Tag 20 Runners. 
Escape Artist: Survive 20 matches.
